channel.title: hmmm on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in hmmm on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Lost the plot with Japanese lessons
item.description: 12:51 Thursday 06 June 2019 JST I haven’t been prepping for Japanese lessons in the past week or so. Ain’t listened to podcasts or nothin’. I have been watching a Japanese drama; I just finished the first season of カケグルイ (though I am not sure which characterset they use to spell it)

item.title: effin around with gatsby
item.description: 20:17 Thursday 14 February 2019 JST A man named Fust has recommended a new stack for Marble Track 3: Airtable as backend, Gatsby as frontend, and some other things I have not heard of. Actually I had not heard of Gatsby. I have an old VirtualBox sitting around so I spun it up and loaded a Gatsby demo. It pooped out a bunch of deprecation warnings, so I am loathe to really dig into this thing if it will be an ongoing battle against a bunch of deprecations ongoing during the project, as well as making the marble track itself.

item.title: chillin at the airport in Sao Paulo
item.description: 23:16 Saturday 30 December 2017 -02 I think we thought the flight leaves at 00:15, in which case we would begin boarding in 20 minutes or so. But it’s at 01:15 so we have 80 minutes or so. Lin is shopping for souvenirs though our bags are overweight, and will apparently cost $100 in Dubai because *they are very strict there”

item.title: trust
item.description: 10:50 Monday 20 June 2016 JST Okay a weird thing happened the other day. A friend of a friend offered to let me use her crib for lessons, but she smokes so I don’t really want to use the place. (I’ve been there before.) I told my friend my concern but asked friend not to tell her. Friend told her anyway and she got all pissed off and said nevermind, plus I hereby quit (lessons, not smoking).

item.title: svg hello world not working
item.description: ##18:03 Thursday 19 March 2015 JST## I’ve got &lt;svg id="static" width="100" height="150"> &lt;defs> &lt;pattern id="yqkfx" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="20" height="20"> &lt;circle cx="10" cy="10" r="4" fill="transparent" stroke="#340034" stroke-width="2">&lt;/circle> &lt;/pattern> &lt;/defs> &lt;/svg> <svg id="static" width="100" height="150"> <defs> <pattern id="yqkfx" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="20" height="20"> <circle cx="10" cy="10" r="4" fill="transparent" stroke="#340034" stroke-width="2"></circle> </pattern> </defs> </svg> But it’s not displaying for me.
